title: Raghav Sethi
text: I had a few properties in Mumbai that I wanted to put up on rent which was becoming extremely difficult for me as I had moved to the States. Then I came across Flat and Flatmates where I could directly meet the tenant and discuss their needs and align those with mine. It has been a hassle free experience and I have rented out most of my places. Cheers!

title: Ravneet Kukreja
text: Being a girl my biggest concern was a safe and secure locality. I wanted to avoid brokers at all cost because they levy hefty charges and don't provide correct information. I met my landlady on Flat and Flatmates and I felt so secure that I could discuss every concern with her. I am glad I landed up here which saved my time, money and energy

title: Samiksha Pandit
text: I am so so so fortunate to have found my flatmate through Flat and Flatmates. My flatmate is the perfect roomie for me. I was new to Mumbai and needed a like minded person to share my flat and expenses with. Flat and flatmates proved to be my guardian angel where I met my roomie who has now become a part of my family.
